page.title: 09The Yorkshire Sculpture Park
page.content: The Yorkshire Sculpture Park is in the grounds of Bretton Hall College.As we entered the park we passed the sculpture zoo.People were given wood, string and nails to make animals to go into the sculpture zoo.We were allowed to go into the kennel block to look at the project about birds that students had been doing.We all liked the Triceratops because it had the most detailed shape.Then we walked down to the totem pole.It was brightly coloured.We went to see the Family of Man which was by Barbara Hepworth.We saw the men putting together an exhibition of Ossip Zadkine.Some of the sculptures are weird but we think it is a good idea to make people think about things.
